H0.text: Marat, Robespierre, Danton are names associated with what event at the end of the 18th century. French Uprising

H1.text: Marat, Robespierre, Danton are names associated with what event at the end of the 18th century. European Enlightenment

H2.text: Marat, Robespierre, Danton are names associated with what event at the end of the 18th century. Reign of Terror

H3.text: Marat, Robespierre, Danton are names associated with what event at the end of the 18th century. RÃ©volution

A4.text: The Terror concluded with the fall of Robespierre and his alleged allies in July 1794, in what is known as the Thermidorian Reaction.

A5.text: The Convention shut down the Paris Bourse and banned all commerce in precious metals, under penalties.

A6.text: Danton was arrested and executed on 5 April with Camille Desmoulins, after a show trial that arguably did more damage to Robespierre than any other act in this period.

A7.text: From March to July, executions in Paris increased from 5 to 26 per day.
